title: Sampler, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Horizontal rectangle enclosing five alphabets, one set of numbers in black with multicolor motifs of people, birds, and animals.  Three cartouches at top with floral swags.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-35.
